mdRecord.dcterms:title: York River Virginia, from King's Creek to West Point / from a trigonometrical survey under the direction of A.D. Bache Superintendent of the Survey of the Coast of the United States ; triangulation by Lieut. J.P. Roy U.S.A. Asst. ; topography by John Seib Assistant ; hydrography by the parties under the command of Lieuts. J.J. Almy & R.D. Minor U.S.N. Assists
York River, upper

mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 41 x 56 cm. on sheet 55 x 71 cm. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Relief shown by depth soundings and shading.
Oriented with north towards upper left.
"Issued Augutst 1877 C.P. Patterson Superintendent. Verified, J.E. Hilgard Assistant in charge of office. (Date of first publication 1858.)"
Engd. by W. Langran & F.W. Benner.
Printed left to right in upper margin: No. 399 Price 20 cents. Plate No. 775. Electrotype copy no. 1 by G. Mathiot U.S.C.S.
Printed in lower right margin: York River, Upper). U.S.C. & G.S. 399."
